head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FRIEDER, ELLIOT L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FRIEDER, ELLIOT L.

block.p: FRIEDER-Elliot L. Beloved husband of the late Leonie. Loving brother of Jehudith (Rosel) Hermoni, Hannah Lehrman and Sol. Beloved uncle of Lea Pridor, Myriam Beer-Lehrman, Elisheva Goren, Daniel A. Lehrman, Chaim Hermoni and their families. Also survived by the Kranzler family. Services at 12 noon Wednesday, Plaza Memorial Chapel, 91 Street and Amsterdam Avenue.

FRIEDER-Elliot L. Beloved husband of the late Leonie. Loving brother of Jehudith (Rosel) Hermoni, Hannah Lehrman and Sol. Beloved uncle of Lea Pridor, Myriam Beer-Lehrman, Elisheva Goren, Daniel A. Lehrman, Chaim Hermoni and their families. Also survived by the Kranzler family. Services at 12 noon Wednesday, Plaza Memorial Chapel, 91 Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
